Dec 14, 2021

One ARK Invest exchange-traded fund run by ETF star Cathie Wood made a huge sale on Monday. This fund sold over 1,700 shares of Amazon.com Inc. ( NASDAQ: AMZN ), while the price of this ETF was down over 2% on the day. Note that the ETF is down a fair amount in the past year.It was ARK Next Fintech Innovation ETF ( NYSEARCA: ARKF ) that sold 1,794 shares of Amazon. At Monday's closing price, this would have valued this sale at $6.1 million. Even though this is a small fraction of the total holdings, every little bit counts. The fund is down around 14% in the past 12 months.Check out all of ARK Invest's Sales for Monday :

Catherine Wood, the CEO and CIO of ARK Investment Management, is a minority and nonvoting shareholder of 24/7 Wall St.
